title: Thank You to Everyone and to You!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Hey hey, this joint event is the best! Lanzhu felt like Lanzhu became friends with everyone that came to see us!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Same for me! It feels like the Ai-friends circle has expanded way way waaay more than before!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Me too, it was so much fun! I’m glad it turned out to be such a great event!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu heard from Honoka and Chika. They said that you were the captain of today’s event, Ayumu.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eeeeh!? That’s an exaggeration! This is all Honoka-chan and Chika-chan’s ideas!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai really loves that part about you, but you should have more confidence in yourself. We all think that you’ve become an admirable person, Ayumu.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I-, is that so.... But even if that’s true, it’s thanks to you guys and the people who support us that I’m like this now. That’s why all I want to put in my songs is my feeling of gratitude.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Fufu, then let’s deliver that feeling to everyone! Ah, Lanzhu has properly accepted your feeling already, so don’t worry about it, Ayumu!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>It seems like today’s stage will be even better~! Let’s get fired up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah! I’ll go say my thank you to everyone.... and to you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
